author: josander
msg: Finished issue #1133: MSVCP60.DLL missing when running svn client
The installer will warn the user and add (and tell the user about) a Start Menu
item (HTML file) which helps the user to download and install the VC Runtime
files if MSVCP60.DLL is missing during installation.
Added routines for for handling issue #1133. This file was emty but the
Contains info and links for dowloading and installing VC6 runtime files.
(Icons): Adding "missing_msvcp60dll.html" to the Start Menu if MSVCP60.DLL are
(Code):  Are using isx_main.pas for Pascal Script routines.

author: clkao
msg: Fix a configure error message introduced in rev 6650.

author: kfogel
msg: Fix bug introduced in revision 6638, whereby 'svn co schema://host'
would seg fault due to the lack of trailing '/' on the host.
Thanks to Magnus Stahre <ms@xy.org> for reporting this, and for
supplying a patch.  I didn't actually notice his patch, which was
attached to his post, until I'd written the exact same fix :-).  Nice
to know that we came up with the same solution, anyway.
(svn_path_is_uri_safe): Just return true if nothing after host.

author: kfogel
msg: More work on issue #1192: Convert update tests to new exception method.
(Several balls blocking in the air right now, needed a mindless task
to do while waiting for one to fall back down. :-) )

author: kfogel
msg: With Mike Pilato, fix issue #1461: Exporting an empty directory did
(svn_client_export): Call open_root_internal to create the empty
directory, when the editor won't do it for us.
